description.@en: While some rely on rudimentary hand-me-down recipes, I have perfected their creation through rote and repetition.

effect.@en:
Create Medicine: Decide first which medicine you wish to create: Laudanum, Smelling salts or Tincture. Depending on where you’re at on the Damage Condition Track, the Difficulty Rating eases or worsens:

Unharmed: (Easy +20%) Alchemy

Hurt: (Routine +10%) Alchemy

Moderately Wounded: (Standard +/-0%) Alchemy

Seriously Wounded: (Challenging -10%) Alchemy

Grievously Wounded: (Hard -20%) Alchemy

Effect: If successful, you create a number of doses for every 6 points of your [IB]. If failed, nothing happens.

[IB] 1 to 6: One dose

[IB] 7 to 12: Two doses

[IB] 13+: Three doses

criticalSuccess.@en: You create Three doses of medicine.

reagents.@en: You must have access to an alchemical laboratory, arsenic and one of the following: opium (for Laudanum or Tincture) or salt (for Smelling salts). You must also have opium to create Laudanum, salt to create Smelling salts or quicksilver to create Tincture.
